sentences.english: In the world of today, absolute majority countries have parties and exercise party politics.
sentences.chinese: 当今世界，绝大多数国家都存在政党，实行政党政治。

sentences.english: Moral assessment is difficult to carry out in the process of selecting the Party and Government cadres in China.
sentences.chinese: 品德测评是我国党政干部选拔中的难点问题。

sentences.english: The globalization brought the multiform relationship of between the party and government.
sentences.chinese: 全球化为我们带来了党政关系的多种模式。

sentences.english: The revolutionary war, military leaders and the central Bohai Sea Area Agency.
sentences.chinese: 革命战争年代，是中央渤海区党政军领导机关所在地。

sentences.english: Are the opposition recognizable as members of the same party described by Stalin ?
sentences.chinese: 反对阵营承认由史达林描绘的党政机构吗？

sentences.english: Look, your party, government and army leaders have left their seats.
sentences.chinese: 看，贵国的党政军领导人已经离开座位了。

sentences.english: Corruption results from the Party and government cadres' abusing their power and position.
sentences.chinese: 腐败是党政干部滥用人民权力的结果。

sentences.english: Nowadays in China the Party-administrated department and university co-responsibility system is practiced in higher education.
sentences.chinese: 高校院系领导体制目前实行的是党政共同负责制。

sentences.english: This research was aimed at exploring the structure of job performance of Chinese local party and government executives.
sentences.chinese: 本研究旨在系统探讨党政领导干部工作绩效的结构。

sentences.english: The party politics therefore become the research early time people national history an important topic.
sentences.chinese: 政党政治因此成为研究早期民国史的一个重要课题。

sentences.english: But the vote illustrated again the partisan nature of American politics.
sentences.chinese: 但表决再次表明了美国政治的政党政治性质。

sentences.english: A number of governments block access to any address with WikiLeaks in the name.
sentences.chinese: 大量的党政集团以维基泄密网的名义进行地址的链接。

sentences.english: What kind of parallel relations do the Party, Government and Army have in the superstructure of China?
sentences.chinese: 党政军在中国上层建筑中具有怎样的平行关系？

sentences.english: Construction of office buildings for Party and government organs will be strictly controlled.
sentences.chinese: 严格控制党政机关楼堂馆所建设。

sentences.english: Part Four, the theoretical foundation of the accountability system for the inaction of the party and government cadres.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，党政干部无为问责制的理论基础。

sentences.english: Some localities have degenerated into private fiefdoms run by local party officials.
sentences.chinese: 一些地方已经沦为地方党政官员的私人封地。

definition: party affairs/work within the Communist party
united front (abbr. for 統一戰線|统一战线[tong3 yi1 zhan4 xian4])
working hand/member of a work team/participant/(short form of 第一把手[di4 yi1 ba3 shou3]) the boss
United Front Work Department of CCP Central Committee (UFWD)/abbr. for 統一戰線工作部|统一战线工作部[Tong3 yi1 Zhan4 xian4 Gong1 zuo4 bu4]
CPPCC (Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference)/abbr. of 中國人民政治協商會議|中国人民政治协商会议[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4]
within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)
secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
